summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingQuick-absorbing, lightweight Bobbi Brown Hydrating Eye Cream melts into skin, leaving undereyes soft, smooth, and refreshed.
details: DetailsBenefitsSignature Enriched Mineral Water Blend hydrates, balances, and revives skinAloe Vera, Witch Hazel, Jojoba Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, and Squalane help skin to feel comfortable and conditionedThe quick-absorbing formula creates a smooth, hydrated base for concealerKey IngredientsSignature Enriched Mineral Water BlendAloe VeraWitch HazelJojoba Seed OilAvocado OilSqualaneFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesGlutenSulfitesItem 2583621How To UseApply with fingers, patting gently around eye area.IngredientsWater\aqua\eau, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (avocado) Oil, Hamamelis Virginiana (witch Hazel) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cholesterol, PEG-100 Stearate, Glycerin, Sodium Pca, Trehalose, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydroxyproline, Proline, Acrylates Copolymer, Phytantriol, Glycine, Linoleic Acid, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply with fingers, patting gently around eye area.

reviews.headline: Best Eye Cream
reviews.comments: I have used this eye cream for twenty years. I have tried many others. This one is by far the most hydrating I have ever found.

reviews.headline: Best Eye Cream
reviews.comments: I have used this eye cream for twenty years. I have tried many others. This one is by far the most hydrating I have ever found.

reviews.headline: Love it! Highly recommend!
reviews.comments: I've been using this eye cream for a few years now and I absolutely love it! I have very dry skin and this eye cream keeps my under eyes hydrated throughout the day. Love it!

reviews.headline: Super hydrating
reviews.comments: I mainly use this for mixing in with my concealer.  Leaves a flawless finish.  Don't need a lot so it lasts a long time.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Wish I'd tried this eye cream years ago. Very hydrating and it absorbs quickly so it's perfect before applying makeup.

reviews.headline: High Expectations
reviews.comments: I bought this based on sll the positive reviews. Not sure but i saw no chsnge at all in my lines if anything they were worse. Did not and eoyod nit repurchase. Better products at a much cheaper price. Way over priced in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating
reviews.comments: Very hydrating. No smell. Love it.

reviews.headline: Definitely hydrating!
reviews.comments: I purchased this product because it said hydrating eye cream. There's a difference between moisture and hydrating. This has proven to be a worthwhile purchase. I have very dry under eyes and this has worked great.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive eyes/ skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin in general and the delicate eye area especially. Caused redness, burning, stinging immediately and although I washed it right off the issue continued for several days! I had to put Vaseline under my eyes to alleviate the burning sensation.

reviews.headline: not worth the hype
reviews.comments: i wouldn't say this eye cream is hydrating. i used this after applying an eye serum and before applying my concealer but there were still creases after an hour. i know it's not my concealer bc i didn't see any creases when i didn't use this product so i'm not using this anymore. it's a shame bc it's so pricey for something that doesn't work well.

reviews.headline: When nothing else worked, enter Bobbi Brown
reviews.comments:
I've tried so many eye creams, and every single time I am disappointed. I've tried squalene, and hyaluronic acid, and serums and brighteners. Each one assuring me that this brand would be the one that would actually deliver. Every morning I would wake up to puffy eyes and red marks, or worse - stinging and sensitivity!  I had stopped looking for under eye cream, because I figured it just wasn't for me. 

Then one day I stumbled across Bobbi Brown's under eye cream. Tentatively I tried it out on my good eye - those of us with sensitive skin know. I cautiously tested under the eye that doesn't sting or puff up as badly. I wasn't expecting anything, and I was hoping it would not irritate. The reason I tried it was because they said it would help with the fine under eye lines, and at 55, I so desperately wanted concealer product to not crease up without the theatrics of setting powder that dries your skin. 

When I woke up the next morning, I was shocked there was no puffiness, and I didn't have the redness under my crows feet that I often got in the past. So I tried it the next night, and then I tried it again. Pretty soon I was using it in the morning too. 

After about a week, I noticed my eyes were smoother and brighter, and had less lines. I had no sensitivity no reactions, and it was an eye cream that actually was working!  That's unbelievable considering for years I have never been able to get anything else to work. 

I plan on using this product for the rest of my life. I am 55 years old, and I'm never going to be without it. I'm so glad that this is a staple beauty product. It'll always be on my skin care shelf, and I hope they never discontinue it.  I hope to keep using this product for the rest of my life.

A real Holy Grail product.

reviews.headline: Worth the price!
reviews.comments: This product is great for undereyes! It's helped my dark bags so much that I can usually skip concealer. It is pricy, but a little goes a long way. I've had the tub for several months and still have plenty left with daily use.

reviews.headline: Love this eye cream!
reviews.comments: Just starting using this eye cream and I love the hydration.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: This eye cream is very nice! I'm not sure it's worth the more than $50 price tag, but if you have the funds this is a good choice. Personally (unless you only want your eye cream to be hydrating) I believe a retinol eye cream or an eye cream with a different active ingredient would be more worth your money. But, I definitely don't hate this!

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive eyes
reviews.comments: Used as directed, and had a terrible allergic reaction. I'll stay away from BB because the ingredients have many irritants and it just isn't worth the price.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!
reviews.comments: I have tried many eye creams and this one is the best. The cream is very moisturizing and goes so well with the tarte shape tape concealer. Holy grail product!!

reviews.headline: Wow!!! Best eye cream out there
reviews.comments: I was amazed by this under eye cream! It's the best I have ever used. I'm switching all my stuff over to Bobbi brown. The results are excellent . So smooth and glowing and perfect for putting your concealer on . Gets rid of fine lines around the eyes

faceoff_positive.comments: The Hydrating Eye Cream is wonderful. I've purchased it multiple times. Adds just the right amount of moisture. Only takes a small amount and my concealer goes on perfect every time. Highly recommend!
faceoff_positive.headline: Can't live without

faceoff_negative.comments:
Having become a complete convert to Bobbi Brown cosmetics, when a BB beauty consultant suggested the use of Hydrating Eye Cream for my dark circles I bought it without question.
However...this is one BB product that I am throwing away before the $50 jar is empty. Why? Even after a few applications, my eye area felt very dry and cracked at the corners. Because it was expensive, I tried the product again all last week. The result was the same, especially the painful corners of my eye which was eased only with the use of a competitor's eye cream.
I will still use BB products, just not this one.
faceoff_negative.headline: Won't Be Using This Product Again
